resources.string: Reference range: General population: SBP: 120(mmHg），DBP: 80(mmHg)\nChronic disease, elderly population: SBP: 140(mmHg），DBP: 90(mmHg)

1. Sit still for 5 minutes before measuring, keeping the center of the cuff at the same height as the heart. \n2. Press the [Switch] button to start measurement. \n3. Please do not talk or move your body during the measurement

1. Connect the device, open arms, palms up, elbows straight, sleeve cuffs \n2. The cuff trachea points to the lower arm, and the lower edge of the cuff is 2-3cm away from the elbow fossa \n3. Cuff hose placed on the pulsating point of brachial artery
Waiting for measurement ... \n \nObtain results after measurement.
1. Extend your arm into the barrel, \n place your elbow in the recess.
2. Maintain the correct sitting position, \npress the [Start/Stop] button, \nstart to measure blood pressure.
